name: Amsterdam
author: Nothing but Thieves
info: Single from album Broken Machine, second album of band Nothing but Thieves

name: The Sky Is a Neighborhood
author: Foo Fighters
info: "The Sky Is a Neighborhood" is a song by American rock band Foo Fighters It was released as the second single from their ninth album Concrete and Gold on August 23, 2017

name: I Will Follow You into the Dark
author: Death Cab for Cutie
info: "I Will Follow You into the Dark " is a song by indie rock band Death Cab for Cutie the third single from their fifth album Plans, released on August 30, 2005

name: Future People
author: Alabama Shakes
info: "Future People" is a song performed by American rock band Alabama Shakes issued as the third single from the band's second studio album Sound & Color

name: Foxtrot Uniform Charlie Kilo
author: Bloodhound Gang
info: Song from Hefty Fine, the fourth studio album by American alternative rock band Bloodhound Gang, released on September 27, 2005
